publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-1341.2 Chris Ballance: Major Events and Festivals in Scotland-As an amendment to motion (S2M-1341) in the name of Mr Frank McAveety, insert at end "further notes that EventScotland's mission statement encompasses environmental as well as other benefits and that the Scottish Executive's major events strategy, while mentioning sustainability and affordability, places these items 11th and 16th respectively out of a total of 16 priorities, and calls on the Executive, through bodies such as EventScotland and VisitScotland, to work to ensure that environmental and community benefits are not given a lower priority in the quest to attract prestige events."
